document.full_text: ivory coast's president on sunday said former prime minister charles konan banny would head a truth and reconciliation commission, set up to heal divisions after months of conflict.
document.title: former prime minister banny to head ivorian reconciliation body
lines_and_colors: ivory coast's president on sunday said former prime minister charles konan banny would head a truth and reconciliation commission, set up to heal divisions after months of conflict.
